tw:
您的資料正送往雲端，除非太陽爆炸，
否則我們將永久為您保存資料。
en: YOUR DATA IS BEING SENT TO THE CLOUD. UNLESS THE SOLAR SYSTEM GETS SUCKED BY A BLACK HOLE, WE SHALL STORE YOUR DATA FOR ETERNITY!

tw: 您的體力已全部恢復，快來打一場球吧。
en: YOUR STAMINA IS FULL! WHY DON'T YOU USE SOME?

tw: 星際摔角界難見的奇才，卻因下級居民的身份只能打假比賽賺取收入。直到某次比賽中失手打敗對方而欠下巨債，家庭破碎。[33FFDD]擁有強壯的體格[-]
en: ONCE A TALENTED WRESTLER UNABLE TO ACHIEVE STARDOM DUE TO HIS UNPRIVILEGED BACKGROUND. FORCED TO PLAY IN SET-UP MATCHES FOR A LIVING HE ENDED UP WITH A HUGE DEBT WHEN HE ACCIDENTALLY DEFEATED A FAKE CHAMP. A FREE MAN NOW HE FIGHTS ONLY FOR HIMSELF, AND BASKETBALL HAS GIVEN HIM A SECOND SHOT AT LIFE. [33FFDD] HE’S A VERY STRONG AND DOMINANT PLAYER UNDER THE RIM.[-]

tw: 原為前途光明的高階星際軍官，意外失去右臂並接受改造卻失敗了，而後淪為政治犧牲品，同時人生盡毀。[33FFDD]擁有高超的命中率[-]
en: HE WAS A HIGH RANKED OFFICER IN THE ARMY, LOST HIS RIGHT ARM IN COMBAT AND THE ROBOTIC ARM HE GOT IMPLANTED BEGAN TO FAIL HIM TOO. DISCHARGED OF THE ARMY WHEN HE NEED THEM THE MOST HE NOW SWEARS ALLEGIANCE TO NO ONE. HE PLAYS TO SAVE ENOUGH MONEY FOR NEW ARM AND TO BRING HONOR BACK TO HIS NAME [33FFDD] HE HAS EXCEPTIONAL RANGE AND ACCURACY.[-]

tw: 貧民窟長大的女孩，為了找尋失蹤的父親，跟照顧年幼的弟妹與母親，身兼多職，在星際酒吧練出敏捷的身手。[33FFDD]擁有靈敏的身手[-]
en: BORN AND RAISED IN THE PROJECTS SHE’S GONE THROUGH LIFE WITHOUT ANYONE’S HELP. HER STRONG WILL HAS MAKE HER MOVE FORWARD AGAINST ALL ODDS. SHE’S WORKED MULTIPLE JOBS TO SUPPORT HERSELF AND HER SISTER, BUT HER PASSION HAS ALWAYS BEEN B-BALL. SHE DREAMS OF A BETTER LIFE FOR HER AND HER SIS AND WITH THAT GOAL IN MIND SHE’S UNSTOPPABLE IN THE COURT.[33FFDD]POSSESS EXCELLENT AGILITY[-]

1. Find the same series of skill cards and combine them.
2. After you combine the cards press  [33FFDD]start[-] to for it to take effect. Click again to close.
3. Note that the [33FFDD]upper limit[-] has increased.
